title: Melisa Rollins Finally Won the Race That Shaped Her Pro Cycling Career
content:
The 28-year-old from Salt Lake City won the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race on Saturday, eight years after lining up for the first time.

Read the full article at Melisa Rollins Finally Won the Race That Shaped Her Pro Cycling Career on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
